title: warlord's bloodlust dosen't work?
body:
I played yasou and Trydamere. when critical, it doesn't heal and no attack speed bonus. is it bug or something wrong? I want to known is just happen to me or everyone ?

sorry for my bad English.

replies.body: Riot hot fixed it so that now it only works when you crit against an enemy champion. It no longer works against minions or monsters.

I believe that Riot said they were going to hotfix it to only activate when you critically strike an enemy champion (so it won't work on monsters or minions anymore).  However, the tooltip text doesn't seem to be updated and I haven't tried using it recently.

This would bring it in-line with the other offensive keystone masteries which may also only activate against enemy champions.
I think it should hit minions or monsters. I might as well redo my masteries for my Gangplank if that is the case.
It is. It's why he thinks it's a bug lol.

Same problem just now with tryndamere.  I would like to think that Riot actually balanced that mastery a bit and made it ranged attacks only, but my opponent's were working an hour ago, and mine wasn't just now so that isn't the case.

Worst time I've ever had in this game is this pre season, and this mastery alone is half the reason.

I try Caitlyn, but not sometimes work, sometimes not.
this pre season changed a lot.
It's probably bugged, and I hope Riot never fixes it.
I think Riot should change it. the warlord's bloodlust is  too much op for some champions.
